title: Mohsin Naqvi congratulates Olympics Gold Medalist Arshad Nadeem
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 09 (APP): Minister for Interior Mohsin Naqvi has congratulated Olympics Champion Arshad Nadeem on winning the Gold Medal in the Javelin Throw competition at the Paris Olympics and setting a new Olympics record.
The Interior Minister praised Arshad Nadeem’s exceptional performance, saying, “The entire nation is proud of you, and you have won the hearts of the people. You have not only become the Champion of the field but also of hearts.”
Mohsin Naqvi said that after 32 years, Arshad Nadeem has made history by winning a medal for Pakistan in the Olympics.
He added that Arshad Nadeem has hoisted the green flag high and achieved a remarkable and unforgettable feat.
Interior Minister attributed Arshad Nadeem’s success to his hard work and professional approach, saying, “Arshad Nadeem’s dedication and the nation’s prayers have borne fruit, and he has emerged victorious in the competition.”
Interior Minister said that Arshad Nadeem’s victory is a victory for Pakistan, which will always be remembered.
He added that Arshad Nadeem is a national hero who has made this day memorable for Pakistan.
